import { ResponsiveComponents } from '../ui/ResponsiveComponents/ResponsiveComponents';
const mobile = /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent);
 
export class DeviceUtils {
 
  static getDeviceName(): string {
    var userAgent = navigator.userAgent;
    Iif (userAgent.match(/Android/i)) {
      return 'Android';
    }
    Iif (userAgent.match(/BlackBerry/i)) {
      return 'BlackBerry';
    }
    Iif (userAgent.match(/iPhone/i)) {
      return 'iPhone';
    }
    Iif (userAgent.match(/iPad/i)) {
      return 'iPad';
    }
    Iif (userAgent.match(/iPod/i)) {
      return 'iPod';
    }
    Iif (userAgent.match(/Opera Mini/i)) {
      return 'Opera Mini';
    }
    Iif (userAgent.match(/IEMobile/i)) {
      return 'IE Mobile';
    }
    Iif (userAgent.match(/Chrome/i)) {
      return 'Chrome';
    }
    Iif (userAgent.match(/MSIE/i) || userAgent.match(/Trident/i)) {
      return 'IE';
    }
    Iif (userAgent.match(/Opera/i)) {

    }
    Iif (userAgent.match(/Firefox/i)) {
      return 'Firefox';
    }
    Eif (userAgent.match(/Safari/i)) {
      return 'Safari';
    }
    return 'Others';
  }
 
  static isAndroid() {
    return DeviceUtils.getDeviceName() == 'Android';
  }
 
  static isIos() {
    var deviceName = DeviceUtils.getDeviceName();
    return deviceName == 'iPhone' || deviceName == 'iPad' || deviceName == 'iPod';
  }
 
  static isIE8or9(): boolean {
    var myNav = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
    Eif (myNav.indexOf('msie') == -1) {
      return false;
    }
    return parseInt(myNav.split('msie')[1]) < 10;
  }
 
  static isMobileDevice() {
    return mobile;
  }
 
  /**
   * @deprecated
   *
   * Use ResponsiveComponents.isSmallScreenWidth() instead
   */
  static isSmallScreenWidth() {
    return new ResponsiveComponents().isSmallScreenWidth();
  }
}
